name: A kiss from Charlotte
description:
New school, new friends, new loves.

As soon as you entered the room, it was love at first sight.

This is a story driven collection of mini-games resolving around school and school love.

This game was made in one week for the indie game dev beginners 2022 game jam, the theme was "nostalgia".

Art and animations : Alan Hyjazi

Music and sounds : Adrien BAO

Programming : DernieresPensees
